Gukesh

Indian GM Gukesh Dommaraju is a chess prodigy, the second-youngest grandmaster in history, and became the challenger to the 2024 FIDE World Championship on April 21, 2024 by winning the 2024 FIDE Candidates Tournament with a score of 9/14.
